postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code = | blank_name = Climate | blank_info = Cfb | blank1_name = | blank1_info = | website = | footnotes = | name = }} Ruhengeri, also known as Musanze, is the third largest city in Rwanda and the capital of Musanze District in the Northern Province of Rwanda. As of the 2022 census, 135,000 people lived there. Ruhengeri is near the lakes of Lake Burera and Lake Ruhondo and is the gateway city to Volcanoes National Park. == References == Category:Cities in Rwanda
title: Ruhengeri
